page.title: 08Balmerino Abbey
page.content: Close by our area you can visit the famous Balmerino Abbey.It is a Cistercian Abbey,now in ruins,but the villagers are raising funds to try to restore it to some of its former glory .The Abbey was built in 1229 by Queen Ermengarde,the mother of Alexander 2nd .He supervised the building.During the Reformation,followers of John Knox destroyed the abbey and killed the monks.Nowadays,it is said that monks can still be seen pushing wheelbarrows around the grounds.In the keep there is said to be a ghost who sits and checks the corn for mice and rats.Now in ruins,the Abbey was,during its glory,visited by many famous people, including Mary Queen of Scots. by Valerie Carmichael. ----------------------
